title: Curated Resources for Circular Fashion
description: A collection of trusted certifications, initiatives, and educational platforms to support ethical, sustainable, and circular fashion.

items.name: GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard)
items.description: Ensures the organic status of textiles from raw material harvesting through environmentally and socially responsible manufacturing.

items.name: Fair Trade Certified
items.description: Promotes ethical sourcing, fair wages, safe working conditions, and environmental sustainability across global supply chains.

items.name: Textile Exchange
items.description: Provides data-driven insights, benchmarks, and tools to accelerate sustainable fiber and material adoption.

items.name: Local Donation & Recycling Hubs
items.description: Learn how to responsibly dispose of or donate textiles through verified local or regional recycling programs.

items.name: Ellen MacArthur Foundation
items.description: A world-leading authority on the circular economy, providing research, frameworks, and practical case studies.

items.name: Sustainable Fashion News & Blogs
items.description: Articles on sustainable dyeing innovations, material science advancements, ethical production, and circular business models.
